step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to keep your elbow straighter for maximum resistance.
You're opening your hand well. Focus on keeping your arm extended overhead throughout this step.
Making a good fist and tightening your muscles. Remember to inhale as you do this.
You're opening your hand and relaxing your muscles nicely. Keep visualizing the fluid moving out.

exercise_summary: Great job with the overhead pumping! Remember to keep your arm fully extended overhead and focus on opening your hand wide. This helps pump fluid effectively.
